summary: Ultra realistic 3D website for digital marketing with shopping features
architectural_notes: 3D rendering required for ultra realistic website experience
E-commerce functionality with shopping cart integration needed
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Hero background with abstract 3D geometric shapes in deep teal and gold tones (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Digital marketing services icon set showing SEO, social media, and analytics in modern minimalist style (services-icons.dim_800x400.png)
- Featured product banner showcasing premium digital marketing package with elegant composition (featured-banner.dim_1200x600.png)

existing_features.title: Implement a 3D interactive homepage using React Three Fiber with ultra-realistic rendering, including lighting effects, shadows, and smooth camera transitions
Create a product catalog system with browsing, filtering, and search capabilities for digital marketing products and services
Build a shopping cart system where users can add products, update quantities, and remove items
Create a checkout flow with order summary, customer information collection, and order confirmation
Design and implement product display cards that integrate into the 3D environment, showing products in an immersive 3D space with interactive elements

Create a cohesive visual design with a modern, professional aesthetic featuring a sophisticated color palette of deep teals, warm golds, and charcoal grays, elegant typography with clean sans-serif fonts, and a premium layout that emphasizes depth and dimension through layering and strategic use of shadows and highlights

new_feature_requests.summary: 3D website interface with ultra realistic visuals
Implement backend data structures and functions in Motoko to store and manage products, including product ID, name, description, price, category, and image URLs
Implement backend order management system in Motoko to store orders, track order status, and retrieve order history
